command.name: ExampleCommand
command.usage: This command is just a simple example to showcase some features of JTAF XCore: Assert that some input text is "Hello World", optionally printing a map of key value pairs and a "Hello." statement if a boolean's value if included in test script.

requiredParameters.string: What to compare against the text from the application ("Hello world")

optionalParameters.map: A map of key value pairs to print if specified
optionalParameters.boolean: A boolean value to print "Hello." if specified true
